  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Faza izvorov</string>
            <string language="en">Phase of sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phase von Quellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phase des sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fase das fontes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fase delle sorgenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάση πηγών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fase de fuentes</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikazana sta dva izvora svetlobnih valov z enako amplitudo in frekvenco a faznim zamikom.</string>
            <string language="en">Interference between two sources of light with the same wavelength and amplitude but different phase shifts.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">interferenca</string>
            <string language="en">interference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fazni zamik</string>
            <string language="en">phase shifts</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung zwischen zwei Lichtquellen mit der 
gleichen Wellenlänge und Umfang aber unterschiedlichen 
Phasenänderungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interférence entre deux sources de lumière avec
la mêmes longueur d'onde et amplitude mais différents de déphasage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Interferência entre duas fontes de luz com o 
mesmos wavelength e amplitude mas deslocamentos de fase diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interferenza fra due fonti luminose con la stessi
lunghezza d'onda ed ampiezza ma di sfasamento differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρέμβαση μεταξύ δύο πηγών φωτός με το ίδιο μήκος 
κύματος και του εύρους αλλά των διαφορετικών μετατοπίσεων φάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Interferencia entre dos fuentes de la luz con la 
misma longitud de onda y amplitud pero diversos desplazamientos de 
fase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phasenänderungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interférence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déphasage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interferência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamentos de fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interferenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">di sfasamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέμβαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετατοπίσεις φάσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interferencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desplazamientos de fase</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
